name: Lovely Little Onion Stand
description:
You love your onions. You'd do anything to get revengerance on someone who unfurls your onion joy.

---

So this is my first Twine game and it's grown to be far greater in scope than I imagined. I haven't had enough time to playtest it thoroughly so please forgive me if there's any problems with it. I will also upload it to my github so if there are any problems, I will address any issues that come up.
